education.title: Codeworks
education.subtitle: Software Engeneering, Javascript
education.details: Full-stack development program that teaches students onsite at the Barcelona office. Throughout the program, created projects using front-end JavaScript frameworks such as React/React Native, Angular.js and Polymer.js, server development with Koa and express, and databases with SQL and MongoDB during 800 hours of instruction and hands-on work.

career.title: Bookup
career.subtitle: Co-Founder and Full-Stack Developer
career.details: Built multiple large-scope apps from scratch using Node.js and GraphQL in the back-end and server-side-rendered React using Next.js in the front-end. Those apps included an extensive admin for businesses (customer management, analytics, payment systems, calendar), online booking and a website builder tool. Improved codebases by upgrading to new releases and implementing new technologies (React 16, Next.js).
